# r-switch



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property        | Attribute        | Description                        | Type                              | Default     |
| --------------- | ---------------- | ---------------------------------- | --------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `activeColor`   | `active-color`   | Background color when on           | `string`                          | `undefined` |
| `activeText`    | `active-text`    | Text displayed when on             | `string`                          | `undefined` |
| `activeValue`   | `active-value`   | Value when on                      | `any`                             | `true`      |
| `ariaLabel`     | `aria-label`     | Aria label                         | `string`                          | `undefined` |
| `checked`       | `checked`        | Whether switch is on               | `boolean`                         | `false`     |
| `disabled`      | `disabled`       | Whether switch is disabled         | `boolean`                         | `false`     |
| `inactiveColor` | `inactive-color` | Background color when off          | `string`                          | `undefined` |
| `inactiveText`  | `inactive-text`  | Text displayed when off            | `string`                          | `undefined` |
| `inactiveValue` | `inactive-value` | Value when off                     | `any`                             | `false`     |
| `inlinePrompt`  | `inline-prompt`  | Whether to show text inside switch | `boolean`                         | `false`     |
| `inputName`     | `name`           | Native name attribute              | `string`                          | `undefined` |
| `loading`       | `loading`        | Whether switch is loading          | `boolean`                         | `false`     |
| `size`          | `size`           | Size of the switch                 | `"default" \| "large" \| "small"` | `'default'` |


## Events

| Event    | Description | Type                   |
| -------- | ----------- | ---------------------- |
| `change` |             | `CustomEvent<boolean>` |
